actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A joint resolution urging the President of the United States, the President of Mexico, and the Prime Minister of Canada to appoint a North American Energy Alliance Commission.

summary.text: Declares that the President should establish an Advisory Commission on Energy Integration with Mexico and Canada which will make recommendations toward the establishment of a North American Energy Alliance.

titles.title: A joint resolution urging the President of the United States, the President of Mexico, and the Prime Minister of Canada to appoint a North American Energy Alliance Commission.
